Hello, we are SHARMA Vivan and GUGELMO CAVALHEIRO DIAS Paulo, and this is the website of our Macroeconomic 3 presentation, dedicated to the review of the empirical facts and macroeconomic theory behind the paper of Junia Howell, and James R. Elliott, *Damages Done: The Longitudinal Impacts of Natural Hazards on Wealth Inequality in the United States*. 

The article is available [on this link](https://academic.oup.com/socpro/article-abstract/66/3/448/5074453?redirectedFrom=fulltext) or [on this one](https://disasterphilanthropy.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Damages-Done.pdf).
